title: Synechron Celebrates $1 Billion Milestone, Grants Equity to Global Workforce
description: Synechron Celebrates $1 Billion Milestone, Grants Equity to Global Workforce  Morningstar
content:
PUNE, India and NEW YORK and LONDON, Sept. 2, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Synechron, a leading global digital transformation consulting firm, has crossed a remarkable milestone - $1 billion in revenue. In celebration of this key moment, the company is granting restricted stock units (RSUs) to all employees worldwide.

"Crossing a billion dollars in revenue is a testament to the dedication of our employees and the trust of our clients and partners over the past 24 years," said Faisal Husain, Synechron's co-founder and CEO. "By granting RSUs to our employees, we're ensuring that everyone who helped us reach this milestone shares in its rewards."

Synechron's journey to $1 billion in revenue, reached this fiscal year, is result of its unique culture, strong client relationships and innovative thinking. The company over more than two decades has evolved to provide innovative solutions – including in AI, data, cloud, digital and DevOps - to clients across many sectors, including more than 200 marquee financial clients.

Co-founded by Faisal Husain in 2001, Synechron started as a self-funded startup in New York City and bootstrapped its way past a billion dollars in revenue. Today, Synechron is a global family of 16,000 people spread across 59 offices in 21 countries.

"Our people and client relationships have been the driving force behind this major achievement," said Mihir Shah, president, Synechron. "This moment isn't just about financial success – it's a tribute to the people and clients and partners that made it possible."

At Synechron, we use the power of digital transformation to drive positive change. As a global technology consulting firm, we blend creativity with innovation to deliver cutting-edge solutions. Synechron's technologies and strategies span artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, consulting, digital, cloud and DevOps, data, and software engineering. Through our research and development arm, FinLabs, we build award-winning solutions adaptable to the needs of our clients. Synechron has a global workforce of 16,000 employees spread across 59 offices in 21 countries. Discover more on our website or LinkedIn.

For more information:

Rashmi Joshi,

Head - Global PR and Media and Analyst Relations, Synechron

(+91) 9560694654

In celebration, the company is granting restricted stock units (RSUs) to all employees worldwide. The company's journey to this milestone is due to its unique culture, strong client relationships and innovative thinking. Co-founded by Faisal Husain in 2001, Synechron is now a global family of 16,000 people spread across 59 offices in 21 countries.
shortSummary: Synechron, a leading global digital transformation consulting firm, achieved $1 billion in revenue with strong employee support, and is granting restricted stock units to global employees.

scraped_sources.text:
We work with businesses globally to deliver tailored, end-to-end Artificial Intelligence, Consulting, Data, Digital, Cloud & DevOps and Software Engineering solutions that drive value and growth.
Our business domain expertise covers hi-tech, financial services and insurance, while we explore the art of the possible in our groundbreaking Financial Labs (FinLabs).
Operating at the intersection of human and AI creativity, our suite of AI-backed solutions streamlines services and provides insights and efficiencies to business at scale. Get practical applications that augment Business Growth, enhance Operational Efficiency and increase Developer Productivity.
Synechron Nexus is a suite of AI-backed solutions that augment human capabilities to boost growth, efficiency and productivity.
We know why we’re an award-winning great place to work. Now it’s time for you to find out.
Discover careers at Synechron

They're Here! Our FinLabs has just released new CyberAI accelerators to help companies stay on the leading-edge of cybersecurity. Here's a quick rundown of our newest offerings: • InfraSec. AI: Centralizes infrastructure monitoring and enriches security data to prioritize vulnerabilities. It supports dynamic threat detection, continuous compliance, and operational resilience through AI-driven insights. • VendorRisk. AI: Enables proactive, AI-driven supplier risk management by automating the analysis of documents, financials, compliance, and threat intelligence. It delivers unified vendor risk scores and real-time monitoring for enhanced supply chain security. • DataSec. AI: Provides continuous visibility into sensitive data across hybrid and multi-cloud environments. It automates data discovery, classification, and monitoring, identifying risks using breach prediction and insider threat scoring. It ensures compliance with regulations like GDPR. Read the full press release to find out even more – https://lnkd.in/ejeTRgNc

Updates
-
We’ve hit a major milestone, we’ve crossed $1 billion in revenue! To celebrate, we are making every employee a shareholder. Listen to CEO and Co-founder @FaisalHusan as he tells the story of how we got here. From a small team in NYC to a global family of 16,000, this achievement is a direct reflection of our collective drive, innovation and client-first mindset. Thank you to everyone who has made this possible. The next billion is not that far off.
-
One week on, we are still reflecting on the impact of EmpowHer Scotland, co-hosted and proudly sponsored by NatWest Group. The session brought together women leaders, professionals, and advocates to focus on inclusion, up-skilling, and leadership in financial services and technology. Watch the video for key moments from an inspiring day.
-
Ready to explore the practical impact of Agentic AI? Join us on October 8 at Synechron’s Dubai office for “Staying Ahead with Agentic AI: Insights, Tools, and Talent.” Discover real-world applications, learn how new protocols and orchestration tools are changing the landscape, and meet the minds who are advancing organizational AI capabilities. Connect with industry professionals, gain actionable insights, and see Synechron-built solutions live. Reserve your spot today, spaces are limited https://lnkd.in/e-FaURYx

You could feel the energy in the room as women in technology and financial services, along with allies and advocates, connected to share insights on inclusion, up-skilling, and career growth. This EmpowHer session was proudly sponsored by Natwest and we already cannot wait for the next one.

Yesterday, Synechron’s London office hosted another EmpowHer session. We welcomed women and allies from tech and finance to share leadership journeys, strengthen community ties, and spark meaningful conversation. A big thank you to our guest speakers Alison Pain, Koral Anderson, Wendy Redshaw and Aga Siugzdinis, and to everyone who contributed to making this event a memorable step in building our global, inclusive EmpowHer movement.

argos_summary: Synechron has reached $1 billion in revenue, a milestone achieved in its fiscal year, and is rewarding all employees worldwide with restricted stock units. The company attributes its growth to a strong culture, client relationships, and innovative digital transformation services, including AI, cloud, and DevOps. Co‑founder Faisal Husain and president Mihir Shah highlighted the collective effort behind the achievement and the company’s commitment to sharing the success with its workforce.
